messages.subject: Re: Anyone around Boulder CO?
messages.msgSnippet: I m in Denver.  I ve lived here for 10 years, but strangely enough I ve only been to Boulder a handful of times. Boulder has lots of open space and many hiking
messages.messageBody:
I'm in Denver. I've lived here for 10 years, but strangely enough I've
only been to Boulder a handful of times.

Boulder has lots of open space and many hiking trails. I don't know
specifics, but it should be easy to figure out just by asking around.

Pearl Street Mall is a pedestrian mall that's fun for people watching.
Fun shops, bookstores, and cafes.

Celestial Seasonings is nearby. They have a free tour that runs every
half hour to hour or so if you're interested in sampling some teas and
seeing how they're bagged and packaged.

I have too many things going on during this week already, otherwise I
would drive up to meet you. Have a fun visit!

Rebecca

messages.subject: Anyone around Boulder CO?
messages.msgSnippet: We re tagging along with dh and will be here Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday. It s been years since I was here last and was looking for fun inexpensive things
messages.messageBody:
We're tagging along with dh and will be here Tuesday, Wednesday and
Thursday. It's been years since I was here last and was looking for
fun inexpensive things to do. :-) Meeting friends is always great.

Melissa, Oklahoma
